body.h1: [BIP Proposal] P2SH and Version 0 Segwit Script enforcement from genesis

ul.a: click here to read brief discussion

hr.p: The proposer suggests backdating the Pay to Script Hash (P2SH, BIP 16) script rules and the Version 0 Witness Program script rules (BIP 143/141) to the genesis block as a way to simplify consensus rules. This change will allow protocol implementers to avoid writing and testing code paths that are no longer relevant and can be enforced with only one historical exception. The full BIP draft is available on GitHub, and an open pull request to Bitcoin Core which implements this change is also provided.
